title: Pitchfork's Top 50 Albums for 2008 (16-30)
description:
This is the second installment of a 4 torrent set - each torrent is in 15 albums sets from Pitchfork's Top 50 Albums for 2008 - with an additional 10 albums (my favorites that were not included in Pitchfork's list) in the last set. This torrent is 16 thru 30. The next will be 31 thru 45 and so on.  

16. Vivian Girls - Vivian Girls
17. Fucked Up - The Chemistry of Common Life
18. The Mae Shi - HLLLYH
19. The Walkmen - You & Me
20. Fuck Buttons - Street Horrrsing 
21. Kanye West - 808's & Heartbreak
22. Santogold - Santogold-2008
23. Hot Chip - Made In The Dark 
24. Gang Gang Dance - Saint Dymphna 
25. Titus Andronicus - The Airing Of Grievances
26. Atlas Sound - Let The Blind Lead Those Who Can See But Cannot Feel
27. Max Tundra - Parallax Error Beheads You
28. Flying Lotus - Los Angeles
29. The Hold Steady - Stay Positive
30. Los Campesinos - We Are Beautiful We Are Doomed

As the list clearly demonstrates - it has been another amazing year in music - apart from the usual mainstream commercial drivel that dominates the corporate airwaves. 

I want to thank everyone in TPB community for making this one of the best torrent sites anywhere. May you all have a peaceful, prosperous, and transformational 2009. Enjoy!
